headline: Mastercard unveils new $12B stock buyback program; hikes quarterly dividend
summary: Investing.com -- Mastercard announced Tuesday a $12 billion stock buyback program and the payments company also hiked its quarterly dividend.

raw.headline: Mastercard unveils new $12B stock buyback program; hikes quarterly dividend
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Mastercard announced Tuesday a $12 billion stock buyback program and the payments company also hiked its quarterly dividend.

headline: Mastercard to buy back up to $12 billion shares
summary: The company said its new share repurchase program will become effective at the completion of its previously announced $11 billion program.  As of Dec. 13, the company had about $3.9 billion remaining under the current buyback program, Mastercard said.  Shares of Mastercard inches up about 0.72% to $534.83 in after-hours trading.

headline: NZ Commerce Commission cuts local companies' fees for Visa, Mastercard payments
summary: The proposal would lead to an annual reduction of around NZ$260 million ($149.50 million) in the largest component of the fees charged to New Zealand businesses for receiving Visa and Mastercard payments, according to the Commission's statement.  "We're also setting the clear expectation that payment providers and businesses should pass these savings on to customers," said Commission Chair John Small.

headline: Mastercard Board of Directors Announces Quarterly Dividend and $12 Billion Share Repurchase Program
summary: PURCHASE, N.Y., December 17, 2024--Mastercard today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of 76 cents per share.

headline: New software will be key theme for small businesses in 2025
summary: 2025 is expected to be a big year for small businesses due to opportunities in software, Hello Alice co-founder and president Elizabeth Gore tells Wealth host Brad Smith. "There's going to be about five times the amount of small businesses launching in 2025 than our history," Gore says, adding, "Any investments in software, that's going to enable them to sell." She highlights Shopify (SHOP), NerdWallet (NRDS), and Mastercard (MA) as opportunities to play as small business owners adopt the latest software to help them operate and run more efficiently. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.

headline: Mastercard Raises Dividend, Authorizes $12 Billion Buyback Program
summary: By Denny Jacob Mastercard increased its quarterly dividend by 15% to 76 cents a share from 66 cents a share. The new payout, equal to $3.04 a year, represents an annual yield of about 0.6%...
